content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Hello Yi-Nuo,

I am not obliged to tell you the details of the apartment. However, I can tell you that it is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.

Now, let's talk about the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I consider 500 euros per month to be too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 600 euros per month? This is a newly built apartment in the city center, and it's also close to important facilities. It's a good deal for you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I consider 600 euros per month to be too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 650 euros per month? This is a fair price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I consider 650 euros per month to be too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 700 euros per month? This is the lowest price I can offer for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I consider 700 euros per month to be too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, how about 750 euros per month? This is the final price I can offer for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
